Class Framebuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.graphic.Framebuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable

    public class Framebuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deletable
    Represents a framebuffer.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Framebuffer.Config
      Represents framebuffer configuration options.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Framebuffer()
      default: default configuration settings.
      Framebuffer(Framebuffer.Config config)
      Creates a new framebuffer with the given size, an optional depth components and the given number of color components.
